text: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka tatkala mereka membuat Kami murka, Kami menghukum mereka lalu kami tenggelamkan mereka semuanya (di laut),
